column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Zuko says : " The only view I 'm interested in seeing is the Avatar in chains . "
#Text=Iroh says : " You know , the Avatar has n't been seen for one hundred years .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Prince Zuko , it 's only been a week since your banishment .
#Text=You should take some time to heal and rest .
#Text=" Zuko says : " What else would I expect to hear from the laziest man in the Fire Nation ?
#Text=The only way to regain my honor is to find the Avatar , so I will .
#Text=" Teo says : " It 's so different from the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=I wonder if there are any secret rooms .
#Text=" Haru says : " Let 's go check it out !
#Text=" Katara says : " You guys go .
#Text=I think we need to talk about some things .
#Text=" Teo says : " I 'll race you , Duke .
#Text=" The Duke says : " I told you , it 's The Duke !
#Text=" Aang says : " Why ca n't I go ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We need to decide what we 're gon na do now , and since you 're the Avatar , maybe you should be a part of this .
#Text=" Aang says : " Fair enough .
#Text=So , what 's the new plan ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , if you ask me , the new plan is the old plan !
#Text=You just need to master all four elements and confront the Fire Lord before the comet comes .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh , yeah .
#Text=That 's great , no problem .
#Text=I 'll just do that .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , no one said it 's going to be easy .
#Text=" Aang says : " Well , it 's not even gon na be possible !
#Text=Where am I supposed to get a firebending teacher ?
#Text=" Katara says : " We could look for Jeong Jeong !
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah ... right .
#Text=Like we 'll ever run into Jeong Jeong again .
#Text=" Toph says : " Who 's ... oh , never mind .
#Text=If it 's important I 'll find out .
#Text=" Aang says : " Oh well , guess we ca n't come up with anybody .
#Text=Why do n't we just take a nice tour around the temple ?
#Text=" Toph says : " What 's up with him ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " There 's got ta be someone who can teach him firebending .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hello ... Zuko here , but I guess you probably already know me , sort of .
#Text=Uhhh ... so , the thing is I have a lot of firebending experience , and I 'm considered to be pretty good at it .
#Text=Well , you 've seen me , you know , when I was attacking you .
#Text=Uhhh ... yeah , I guess I should apologize for that .
#Text=But anyway , I 'm good now .
#Text=I mean , I thought I was good before , but I realize I was bad , but anyway , I think it 's time I joined your group and taught the Avatar firebending .
#Text=Well , what 's your answer ?
#Text=Yeah ... that 's what I 'd say , too .
#Text=How am I supposed to convince these people that I 'm on their side ?
#Text=What would Uncle do ?
#Text=Zuko , you have to look within yourself to save yourself from your other self .
#Text=Only then will your true self , reveal itself .
#Text=Even when I 'm talking for him I ca n't figure out what he means .
#Text=What would Azula do ?
#Text=Listen , Avatar , I can join your group , or I can do something unspeakably horrible to you and your friends .
#Text=Your choice .
#Text=I guess I 'm just not that good at impersonations .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , can we talk about you learning firebending now ?
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=The wind is too loud in my ears !
#Text=Check out this loop !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , I think we should be making some plans about our future !
#Text=" Aang says : " Okay , we can do that while I show you the giant Pai Sho table !
#Text=Oh , you 're gon na love the all - day echo chamber !
#Text=" Toph says : " I think that 'll have to wait .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hello ... Zuko here .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hey , I heard you guys flying around down there , so , I just thought I 'd wait for you here .
#Text=I know you must be surprised to see me here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Not really , since you 've followed us all over the world .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Right .

#Text=Well , uhhh ... anyway ... what I wanted to tell you about is that I 've changed , and I , uhhh , I 'm good now , and well I think I should join your group , oh , and I can teach firebending to you .
#Text=See , I , uhhh ... " Toph says : " You want to what now ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You ca n't possibly think that any of us would trust you , can you ?
#Text=I mean , how stupid do you think we are ?!
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , all you 've ever done is hunt us down and try to capture Aang !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 've done some good things !
#Text=I mean , I could have stolen your bison in Ba Sing Se , but I set him free .
#Text=That 's something !
#Text=" Toph says : " Appa does seem to like him .
#Text=" Sokka says : " He probably just covered himself in honey or something so that Appa would lick him .
#Text=I 'm not buying it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I can understand why you would n't trust me , and I know I 've made some mistakes in the past .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Like when you attacked our village ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Or when you stole my mother 's necklace and used it to track us down and capture us ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Look , I admit I 've some awful things .
#Text=I was wrong to try to capture you , and I 'm sorry that I attacked the Water Tribe .
#Text=And I never should have sent that Fire Nation assassin after you .
#Text=I 'm going to try and stop - " Sokka says : " Wait , you sent Combustion Man after us ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , that 's not his name , but - " Sokka says : " Ohhh , sorry .
#Text=I did n't mean to insult your friend !
#Text=" Zuko says : " He 's not my friend !
#Text=" Toph says : " That guy locked me and Katara in jail and tried to blow us all up !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why are n't you saying anything ?
#Text=You once said you thought we could be friends .
#Text=You know I have good in me .
#Text=" Aang says : " There 's no way we can trust you after everything you 've done .
#Text=We 'll never let you join us .
#Text=" Katara says : " You need to get out of here .
#Text=Now .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm trying to explain that I 'm not that person anymore !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Either you leave , or we attack .
#Text=" Zuko says : " If you wo n't accept me as a friend , then maybe you 'll take me as a prisoner .
#Text=" Katara says : " No , we wo n't !
#Text=Get out of here , and do n't come back !
#Text=And if we ever see you again , well , we 'd better not see you again !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Uggh !
#Text=I ca n't believe how stupid I am !
#Text=I mean , what was I thinking ?
#Text=Telling them I sent an assassin after them ?
#Text=Why did n't I just say Azula did that ?
#Text=They would have believed that !
#Text=Stupid !
#Text=Uggh !
#Text=" Katara says : " Why would he try to fool us like that ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Obviously he wants to lead us into some kind of trap .
#Text=" Katara says : " This is just like when we were in prison together at Ba Sing Se .
#Text=He starts talking about his mother and making it seem like he 's an actual human being with feelings .
#Text=" Sokka says : " He wants you to trust and feel sorry for him so you let your guard down , then he strikes .
#Text=" Katara says : " The thing is , it worked .
#Text=I did feel sorry for him .
#Text=I felt like he was really confused and hurt , but obviously , when the time came , he made his choice , and we paid the price .
#Text=We ca n't trust him .
#Text=" Aang says : " I kind of have a confession to make .
#Text=Remember when you two were sick and I got captured by Zhao ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " And you made us suck on frozen frogs ?
#Text=How could I forget ?
#Text=I had a wart on the flap that hangs down from the back of my throat for a month !
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , I looked at it , and I told you , there was nothing there !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I could feel it !
#Text=It 's my throatal flap !
#Text=" Aang says : " Anyway , when Zhao had me chained up , it was Zuko who came in and got me out .
#Text=He risked his life to save me .
#Text=" Katara says : " No way !
#Text=I 'm sure he only did it so he could capture you himself !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , face it Aang , you 're nothing but a big prize to him .
#Text=" Aang says : " You 're probably right .
#Text=" Katara says : " And what was all that crazy stuff about setting Appa free ?
#Text=What a liar !
#Text=" Toph says : " Actually , he was n't lying .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , hooray !
#Text=In a lifetime of evil , at least he did n't add animal cruelty to the list .
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm just saying that , considering his messed - up family and how he was raised , he could have turned out a lot worse .
#Text=" Katara says : " You 're right , Toph !
#Text=Let 's go find him and give him a medal .
#Text=The " not as much of a jerk as you could have been " award !
#Text=" Toph says : " All I know is that while he was talking to us , he was sincere .
#Text=Maybe you 're all just letting your hurt feelings keep you from thinking clearly .
#Text=" Katara says : " Easy for you to say !
#Text=You were n't there when he had us attacked by pirates !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Or when he burned down Kyoshi Island !
#Text=" Aang says : " Or when he tried to capture me at the Fire Temple !
#Text=" Katara says : " Why would you even try to defend him ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Because Katara , you 're all ignoring one crucial fact : Aang needs a firebending teacher !
#Text=We ca n't think of a single person in the world to do the job !
#Text=Now one shows up on a silver platter , and you wo n't even think about it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm not having Zuko as my teacher !
#Text=" Sokka says : " You 're darn right you 're not , buddy .
#Text=" Katara says : " Well , I guess that settles that .
#Text=" Toph says : " Ergh !
#Text=I 'm beginning to wonder who 's really the blind one around here !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Who 's there ?
#Text=Stay back !
#Text=" Toph says : " It 's me !
#Text=Ow !
#Text=You burned my feet !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 'm sorry , it was a mistake !
#Text=" Toph says : " Get away from me !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Let me help you !
#Text=I 'm sorry !
#Text=" Toph says : " Get off me , get off me !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I did n't know it was you !
#Text=Uggh , come back !
#Text=Uggh !
#Text=Why am I so bad at being good ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Has anyone seen Toph ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I have n't seen her since she stormed off yesterday .
#Text=" Haru says : " Maybe she 's just exploring the air temple .
#Text=There are some pretty fun spots to practice earthbending .
#Text=" Katara says : " I think we should go look for her .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Let her have fun with her rocks .
#Text=I 'm in no rush to have her yelling at us again .
#Text=" The Duke says : " We can go check for her !
#Text=" Teo says : " Yeah !
#Text=I want to ride that tunnel down to the Hall of Statues again .
#Text=It will work a lot better now that I fixed my brakes .
#Text=" Katara says : " Toph !
#Text=What happened ?
#Text=" Toph says : " My feet got burned !
#Text=" Katara says : " Oh no , what happened ?
#Text=" Toph says : " I just told you , my feet got burned !
#Text=" Katara says : " I meant , how .
#Text=" Toph says : " Well , I kind of went to see Zuko last night .
#Text=" Aang says : " You what ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Zuko ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Uhhh ... !
#Text=" Toph says : " I thought he could be helpful to us .
#Text=And if I talked to him , maybe we could work something out .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So he attacked you ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Well , he did , and he did n't .
#Text=It was sort of an accident .
#Text=" Aang says : " But he did firebend at you ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Yes .
#Text=" Sokka says : " See ?
#Text=You trusted Zuko , and you got burned .
#Text=Literally !
#Text=" Katara says : " It 's gon na take a while for your feet to get better .
#Text=I wish I could have worked on them sooner .
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , me too .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Zuko 's clearly too dangerous to be left alone .
#Text=We 're gon na have to go after him .
#Text=" Aang says : " I hate to go looking for a fight , but you 're right .
#Text=After what he did to Toph , I do n't think we have a choice .
#Text=" Sokka says : " He 's crafty , but we 'll find a way to capture him .
#Text=" Toph says : " Maybe just invite him back here .
#Text=He 's already offered himself up as a prisoner once .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , get him to come back and say he 'll be our prisoner , then we 'll jump him and really make him our prisoner .
#Text=He 'll never suspect it !
#Text=" Katara says : " You are a master of surprise , Sokka ... "
